decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (AP 004, AP 100, AP 101, AP 102, AP 103, AP110, AP 111, AP 120, AP 201, AP 202, AP 203, AP 210, AP 211, AP 220, AP_000, AP_001, AP_002, AP_003, Design and Access Statement prepared by Paul Vick Architects (654, FN_003, dated 16 December 2015). Received on 11 January 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of rear roof extension incorporating repositioning of two front roof windows to the top floor flat
